titleStmt.title: The present state of Jamaica with the life of the great Columbus the first discoverer : to which is added an exact account of Sir Hen. Morgan's voyage to, and famous siege and taking of Panama from the Spaniards.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Fr. Clark for Tho. Malthus ...,

notesStmt.note: Sir Henry Morgan's voyage to Panama 1670. London : Printed for T. Malthus, 1683 (With special t.p.): p. [55-97].
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
